title: The Ink of the Mountain
tagline: A brother's revolutionary letters ignite a sister's quiet rebellion in the shadow of the Andes.
themes: The Geography of Power: Mountain vs. Capital
Silence as Complicity vs. Speech as Danger

chapters.title: The Letter from the Belly of the Beast
The Tin Box in the Dead Mill

story: Write a letter from Isabel to Tomás, describing the aftermath of her trip to the mill and her changing perception of their mountain home.
Compose a 'found document' from the tin box: a manifesto, a union leaflet, or a coded message from Tomás's cell.
Write a chapter from the perspective of the father, exploring the memory of 'your grandfather against a wall' and his philosophy of survival.
Create a letter from the journalist with a limp to a contact abroad, analyzing the nascent movement and the role of people like Tomás and Isabel.
technical: Build an interactive map tracing the journey of letters between the capital and the mountain, annotating locations with thematic excerpts.
Create a text analysis tool that visualizes the shifting language and density of Marxist/revolutionary terminology across the correspondence.

cover_prompt: A young woman's hands, weathered and stained with ink, carefully unfold a clandestine letter against the rough fabric of her skirt, the paper crinkled and worn from its secret journey, [Detailed Scene & Context: set on a steep mountain slope at dusk, with the oppressive geometric sprawl of a distant capital city visible in the valley below, the Andes mountains looming as ancient, protective witnesses, a single oil lamp flickers beside her], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric and textured style of a Latin American magical realist painter like Fernando Botero or Armando Morales, with a touch of Diego Rivera's social realism, executed in thick, expressive oil paints with visible brushstrokes], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, a centered and intimate composition focused on the hands and letter, with a dramatic low-angle looking up at the woman, making the mountains behind her monumental], [Lighting & Color Palette: dramatic chiaroscuro lighting from the single lamp, casting deep shadows that hide complicit faces, with a color palette of earthy umbers, the deep indigo of twilight, the fiery orange of the lamp, and the stark white of the paper], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
